pr_title: Updated exception handling for worker threads shutdown.

timeline.message: updated code to now log errors only in case when exception is not genreated by unregister api call

timeline.author: mycpuorg

timeline.bodyText: you mentioned this in the commit text but can you explain a bit more? I just want to make sure there are no race conditions hidden here
timeline.author: mycpuorg

replies.bodyText: This change is not required anymore after the lock related handling done in Model.java. Removed this condition.

timeline.message: removed the unrequired handling for illegal monitor state exception
